String.string: Go to Rupeush at the Emergency Camp east of Pora Elinu.
Speak with Rida and give her the hypnotic draught.
Her expression softens as the draught takes effect. Suddenly, her eyes flash and she glares at you!
Speak with Princess Rida and convince her to make peace with Arin.
Kill Rhokasi the Mad at the Bloodtalon Camp east of the Lake of Tears.
Bring Rhokasi's heart to Princess Rida in the Bloodtalon Camp.
Bring Princess Rida's letter to Princess Arin of Pora Elinu.
Return to Pora Elinu and speak with Rida.
